name: easy_recovery
description: You demand employees to renew their passwords very frequently.
event: Whenever someone forgets their password, they request the system to generate a new one for them automatically.
consequences: Attackers can easily get to know that the password recovery page is used so much and start to look for ways to hijack the automated mechanism.
impress-upper: Automatic password recovery coupled with frequent renewals brought too much attention to the password recovery page
impress-lower: Relax the policy for either of these for a better balance.
